languages.text: "Всех! Воров, контрабандистов, пиратов, изменников, еретиков, дезертиров! Попустителей, укрывателей, трусов и лжесвидетелей! Каждого, кто преступал закон, каждого, кто покрывал и молчал о злодеяниях другого. Они все будут осуждены!" {n}С одержимым упрямством Инцендия начинает перебирать бумаги, кажется, уже не замечая этого.{/n}

"All of them! Thieves, smugglers, pirates, traitors, heretics, deserters! Abettors, harbourers, cowards, and perjurers! Any who has ever trespassed, any who has ever protected a miscreant or kept quiet about a crime they knew of. They all will be condemned!" {n}With obsessive determination, Incendia starts going through her papers, seemingly no longer aware that she is doing so.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Всех! Воров, контрабандистов, пиратов, изменников, еретиков, дезертиров! Попустителей, укрывателей, трусов и лжесвидетелей! Каждого, кто преступал закон, каждого, кто покрывал и молчал о злодеяниях другого. Они все будут осуждены!" {n}С одержимым упрямством Инцендия начинает перебирать бумаги, кажется, уже не замечая этого.{/n}

They all will be condemned!" {n}With obsessive determination, Incendia starts going through her papers, seemingly no longer aware that she is doing so.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “所有人！无论是小偷、走私犯、海盗、叛徒、异端分子，还是逃兵！还有那些教唆犯、窝藏者、懦夫、作伪证者！还有那些曾经非法闯入他人领地的人，那些为歹徒提供保护的人，以及那些明知他人犯下罪行却保持缄默的人！所有人都要接受审判！”{n}因森蒂娅带着偏执般的决心，下意识地翻阅起了卷宗，似乎自己都没有意识到自己的动作。{/n}
languages.original_text: "All of them! Thieves, smugglers, pirates, traitors, heretics, deserters! Abettors, harbourers, cowards, and perjurers! Any who has ever trespassed, any who has ever protected a miscreant or kept quiet about a crime they knew of. They all will be condemned!" {n}With obsessive determination, Incendia starts going through her papers, seemingly no longer aware that she is doing so.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “所有人！无论是小偷、走私犯、海盗、叛徒、异端分子，还是逃兵！还有那些教唆犯、窝藏者、懦夫、作伪证者！还有那些曾经非法闯入他人领地的人，那些为歹徒提供保护的人，以及那些明知他人犯下罪行却保持建模的人！所有人都要接受审判！”{n}因森蒂娅带着偏执般的决心，下意识地翻阅起了卷宗，似乎自己都没有意识到自己的动作。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「全員だ！泥棒、密輸業者、海賊、裏切り者、異端者、脱走兵！幇助者、匿う者、臆病者、そして偽証者！不法侵入をした者や罪人をかばった者、また犯罪を知っていながら黙っていた者も。全員死刑だ！」{n}インセンディアは憑りつかれたかのような決意とともに書類をめくる。自分が何をしているのか、分からなくなっているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "All of them! Thieves, smugglers, pirates, traitors, heretics, deserters! Abettors, harbourers, cowards, and perjurers! Any who has ever trespassed, any who has ever protected a miscreant or kept quiet about a crime they knew of. They all will be condemned!" {n}With obsessive determination, Incendia starts going through her papers, seemingly no longer aware that she is doing so.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「全員だ！泥棒、密輸業者、海賊、裏切り者、異端者、脱走兵！幇助者、匿う者、臆病者、そして偽証者！不法侵入をした者や罪人をかばった者、また犯罪を知っていながら黙っていた者も。全員死刑だ！」{n}インセンディアは憑りつかれたかのような決意とともに書類をめくる。自分が何をしているのか、分からなくなっているようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «¡Todos! ¡Ladrones, contrabandistas, piratas, traidores, herejes, desertores, cómplices, encubridores, cobardes y embusteros! Cualquiera que haya entrado ilegalmente, cualquiera que haya protegido a un malhechor o se haya mantenido callado ante un crimen. ¡Todos ellos serán condenados!». {n}Incendia empieza a revisar sus papeles de manera obsesiva, como si hubiera perdido el control de sus actos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "All of them! Thieves, smugglers, pirates, traitors, heretics, deserters! Abettors, harbourers, cowards, and perjurers! Any who has ever trespassed, any who has ever protected a miscreant or kept quiet about a crime they knew of. They all will be condemned!" {n}With obsessive determination, Incendia starts going through her papers, seemingly no longer aware that she is doing so.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Todos! ¡Ladrones, contrabandistas, piratas, traidores, herejes, desertores, cómplices, encubridores, cobardes y embusteros! Cualquiera que haya entrado ilegalmente, cualquiera que haya protegido a un malhechor o se haya mantenido callado ante un crimen. ¡Todos ellos serán condenados!». {n}Incendia empieza a revisar sus papeles de manera obsesiva, como si hubiera perdido el control de sus actos.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Sie alle! Diebe, Schmuggler, Piraten, Verräter, Ketzer, Deserteure! Mittäter, Helfershelfer, Feiglinge und Meineidige! Jeder, der je ein Verbrechen begangen hat, jeder, der je einen Missetäter beschützt oder ein Verbrechen nicht gemeldet hat. Sie werden alle verdammt!" {n}Mit besessener Entschlossenheit beginnt Incendia, ihre Papiere durchzusehen, offenbar ohne zu merken, dass sie das noch tut.{/n}
languages.original_text: "All of them! Thieves, smugglers, pirates, traitors, heretics, deserters! Abettors, harbourers, cowards, and perjurers! Any who has ever trespassed, any who has ever protected a miscreant or kept quiet about a crime they knew of. They all will be condemned!" {n}With obsessive determination, Incendia starts going through her papers, seemingly no longer aware that she is doing so.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sie alle! Diebe, Schmuggler, Piraten, Verräter, Ketzer, Deserteure! Mittäter, Helfershelfer, Feiglinge und Meineidige! Jeder, der je ein Verbrechen begangen hat, jeder, der je einen Missetäter beschützt oder ein Verbrechen nicht gemeldet hat. Sie werden alle verdammt!" {n}Mit besessener Entschlossenheit beginnt Incendia, ihre Papiere durchzusehen, offenbar ohne zu merken, dass sie das noch tut.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Tout le monde ! Les voleurs, les contrebandiers, les pirates, les traîtres, les hérétiques, les déserteurs ! Les incitateurs, les complices, les lâches et les parjures ! Quiconque ayant déjà commis un crime, protégé un mécréant ou passé un délit sous silence. Tous seront condamnés ! » {n}Incendia se met à feuilleter ses papiers avec une détermination obsessionnelle, presque inconsciemment.{/n}
languages.original_text: "All of them! Thieves, smugglers, pirates, traitors, heretics, deserters! Abettors, harbourers, cowards, and perjurers! Any who has ever trespassed, any who has ever protected a miscreant or kept quiet about a crime they knew of. They all will be condemned!" {n}With obsessive determination, Incendia starts going through her papers, seemingly no longer aware that she is doing so.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Tout le monde ! Les voleurs, les contrebandiers, les pirates, les traîtres, les hérétiques, les déserteurs ! Les incitateurs, les complices, les lâches et les parjures ! Quiconque ayant déjà commis un crime, protégé un mécréant ou passé un délit sous silence. Tous seront condamnés ! » {n}Incendia se met à feuilleter ses papiers avec une détermination obsessionnelle, presque inconsciemment.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Hepsi! Hırsızlar kaçakçılar, korsanlar, hainler, kâfirler, asker kaçakları! Tahrikçiler, yataklık edenler, ödlekler ve yalancı şahitler! Girmemesi gereken yere giren herkes, bir imansızı korumuş olan veya bir suçtan haberdar olup da sessiz kalan herkes. Hepsi cezaya çarptırılacak!" {n}İncendia, obsesif bir kararlılıkla belgelerinin üzerinden geçmeye başlıyor. Ne yaptığının farkında değilmiş gibi görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "All of them! Thieves, smugglers, pirates, traitors, heretics, deserters! Abettors, harbourers, cowards, and perjurers! Any who has ever trespassed, any who has ever protected a miscreant or kept quiet about a crime they knew of. They all will be condemned!" {n}With obsessive determination, Incendia starts going through her papers, seemingly no longer aware that she is doing so.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hepsi! Hırsızlar kaçakçılar, korsanlar, hainler, kâfirler, asker kaçakları! Tahrikçiler, yataklık edenler, ödlekler ve yalancı şahitler! Girmemesi gereken yere giren herkes, bir imansızı korumuş olan veya bir suçtan haberdar olup da sessiz kalan herkes. Hepsi cezaya çarptırılacak!" {n}İncendia, obsesif bir kararlılıkla belgelerinin üzerinden geçmeye başlıyor. Böyle yaptığının farkında bile değilmiş gibi görünüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
